document.full_text: world leaders have lauded the inauguration of president alassane ouattara as marking the end of the violence in ivory coast, but villagers in the volatile, cocoa-growing west are much less sure.
document.title: land conflict in ivory coast's wild west simmers on
lines_and_colors: world leaders have lauded the inauguration of president alassane ouattara as marking the end of the violence in ivory coast, but villagers in the volatile, cocoa-growing west are much less sure.
